function.name: CharLength
function.comment: Returns the length of any character or escape code in a document data stream.

input.param: The byte index of the character to inspect.

description.p: This function will compute the byte-length of any UTF-8 character sequence or escape code in a document's data stream.

function.result: The length of the character is returned, or 0 if an error occurs.
